job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Required Skills:

1. Developer role, ML Model implementation, experimentation & related software engineering focused

2. Experience as a data scientist with a preference in forecasting algorithms

3. Python, PySpark development experience a must

  • 1-2 years of software development experience
  • 1-2 years of experience as a data scientist with a preference in forecasting algorithms
  • BS or MS degree is Software Engineering or Computer Science
  • Ability to learn fast and handle multiple priorities
  • Developer role, ML Model implementation, experimentation & related software engineering focused
